head.title: Found a Bug?
head.summary: How to submit a feature request or bug

section.title: Should I Bother?
section.para: Please, if you have a feature you need or would like, request it! We will be indebted. Remember that our motivation is to make writing tests a happy and productive process. :-)

section.title: Guidelines for Submission
section.para: Please fill the short summary and full description, don't worry about the rest of the fields. If you also enter your email address (can be mangled in human-readable form), we will be able to get back to you if we have questions.

We encourage you to check out the active tickets before you submit - your feature or bug may already be there, with helpful comments. In this case, it would be better to add a comment to the existing ticket.
